text: Prime is a 2005 American romantic comedy-drama movie set in Manhattan, New York City. It was written and directed by Ben Younger. It stars Uma Thurman, Meryl Streep and Bryan Greenberg. Thurman plays 37 year old divorced photographer Rafi Gardet, who begins a sexual relationship with 23 year old David Bloomberg, who is Jewish. Streep plays her psychiatrist Lisa Metzger, whom she tells about the relationship. Both women find out that the man involved is Lisa's son. Lisa disapproves of the relationship because of the age-gap and because Rafi is not Jewish. == Other websites == * Category:2005 comedy-drama movies Category:2005 romantic comedy movies Category:2005 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Prime (movie)
